subject: HOW ELSE DO YOU WANT TO RECEIVE YOUR APPROVED PAYMENT?
body:
I've invited you to fill out the following form:
Untitled form

To fill it out, visit:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdakUnHmD_K2ttCWiN3Ua8nhmdJ4gu5QeMlD868Rqs8AVU8Ig/viewform?vc=0&c=0&w=1&flr=0&usp=mail_form_link

UNITED BANK FOR AFRICA PLC.
HEAD OFFICE: U. B. A. HOUSE,
57, MARINA STREET, VICTORIA ISLAND
P. O. BOX 2406, LAGOS - NIGERIA.
http://www.ubagroup.com

REF: UBAPLC/256002224/XCCXX/GMDCEOOFFICE/2024 Our Website is:  
www.ubagroup.com; ISIN CODE: NGUBA0000049827; Legal Form: Other  
non-liability limited; Operational Status: International/Local Operations;  
OUR SWIFT CODE: UNAFNGLA

Date: February 19, 2024

Dear Ms. Susan,

Reference to your outstanding approved payment for release at United Bank  
For Africa Plc, Africa's global Bank and the PAN African banking group  
with references to:

1) Release No. CBN/UBA-544261
2) Payment Code No. 505010
3) Merit No. 401024
4) Allocation No. CBN/NSPM/UBA 2901233
5) Fund Identification No. CBN/DM7171
6) Payment Card Number: 627480 0000030298290

How else do you want to receive this payment approved in your name at  
United Bank For Africa Plc when:

1. You don't have the necessary Classified, Certified, Clearance  
documents to Prove the legitimacy of this payment and to defend yourself as  
the rightful/legitimate owner/beneficiary of the payment as follows:

* IRS-CI Clearance Letter
* Secure Pass & Executed Indemnity
* Financial Service Authority (FSA)
* The Anti-Money Laundering Clearance
* The Anti Terrorist/Anti Drug Law Clearances
* Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC)
* The Financial Action Task Force on Money Laundering (FATF)
* Police Clearance of No Criminal Record Certificate (PCNCRC)
* The Financial Crimes Enforcement Network Clearance (FICENC)

2. You refused Signing/Notary of the original/hard copies of your payment  
Approval/Release Classified, Certified, Clearance and Authorization  
documents as follows:

* Your Payment Agreement (PA)
* Your Fund Final Release Order (FFRO)
* The Payment Voucher (PV)
* Your payment order (PO)
* Exchange Control Approval (ECA)
* Payment Validation Approval (PVA)
* The Fund Ownership Certificate (FOC)
* Fund origin Certificate of Legitimacy (FOCL)
* Federal Ministry of Finance Payment Clearance/Allocation Order (PCAO)
* Presidency Approval and Irrevocable Guarantee Bond (AIGB)
* Deposit Confirmation order (DCO)
* Certificate of Fund Ownership (CFO)
* Official FMJ Fund Clearance Certificate (FCC)
* Fund Ownership Clearance Certificate (FOCC)
* Clean Bill Clearance Certificate. (CBCC)

Without Signing/Notary of the original/hard copies of your payment  
Approval/Release Classified, Certified, Clearance and Authorization  
documents, you will NEVER have the  necessary Classified, Certified,  
Clearance documents to Prove the legitimacy of this payment and to defend  
yourself as the rightful/legitimate owner/beneficiary of the payment and  
will NEVER receive this payment through Bank to Bank wire transfer.

An Online account was set up in your name to enable you receive your  
payment through Online banking using our Internet Banking System through  
any of our Online platform https://www.ubaamerica.com/ click on Internet  
Banking Or https://ibank.ubaamerica.com/FISGFTWEB/ with your bank details  
provided.

1. You refused to tender your Bio-Metrics data to obtain a Bank  
Verification Number (BVN) for the normalization, activation and validating  
of the Online account already set up in your name by the Management of  
United Bank For Africa Plc to enable gradually transfer your funds from our  
Bank to any Bank of your choice.

2. Considering the distance, risk and cost of coming to United Bank For  
Africa Plc to tender your Bio-Metrics data for the purpose of obtaining a  
Bank Verification Number (BVN) for the normalization, activation and  
validating of your Online account, you were offered an Exemption  
Clearance/WAIVER but you refused to comply with the official required which  
will cost you a little money upfront.

Why are you afraid of receiving and Signing/Notary of these documents to  
receive your approved payment unconditionally?

You refused to receive your Payment through any Digital/Crypto currencies  
such as Bitcoin, Etherum, Tither etc

Refused to receive your Payment as a 501.C3 non profit Charity and a non  
taxable funds

You refused to receive your Payment through Cashier cheque and refused to  
receive your Payment through ATM MasterCard. How else do you want to  
receive this payment if truly you are the rightful/legitimate  
owner/beneficiary?

Does it mean or does it imply that this payment was approved in error in  
your name or it was fraudulently approved in your name and now you don’t  
want to claim/receive it any more?

Don’t blame me and the Management of United Bank For Africa Plc if we  
indefinitely revoke this payment for permanent forfeiture as

If you want to confirm my position as the Group Managing Director/Chief  
Executive Officer of United Bank For Africa Plc, simply log into our  
bank's website: www.ubagroup.com or  into  
https://www.ubagroup.com/about-uba/leadership/

I am wishing you a Happy, Successful and Prosperous New Year 2024.

Yours sincerely,

OLIVER ALAWUBA
New Group Managing Director/Chief Executive Officer &
Director General,  Debt Management/Settlement Office
United Bank For Africa Plc.
Direct Phone: +2349058329786
WhatsApp      +234905832978

Google Forms: Create and analyze surveys.

subject: Re: HOW ELSE DO YOU WANT TO RECEIVE YOUR APPROVED PAYMENT?
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. It seems like there are a lot of steps involved in receiving the approved payment. Can you tell me more about the process and how it works?

Best wishes,
Susan
